reviews.title: mixed feelings
reviews.text: My husband and I checked in here for 3 nights The hotel is imaculate , very clean and new looking . Room was very cold at first however it was December my husband sorted the radiator out by letting some air out and the room soon warmed up . Lovely view from our room , as it was December we were the only guests at this hotel , small very quiet village I guess it's a lot bussier in summer . Lovely owners , more than adequate breakfast. Very nice . We did dine on the first evening meal was good . I did feel that the room lacked any character it's basic white wash of walls ceiling made it sort of clinical looking however very clean . We only stayed 2 nights although we paid for 3 we didn't mind paying as it was our decision to leave . It adjust a little too quiet . Village very small and pretty nice if you want a complete retreat from the usual busy spots .

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: was there in september 2012, very nice hotel, beautiful view, graphic village excellent place to spend a few days in relaxing mode... .good breakfast buffet, clean rooms,value for money need a few more signs to find it though. has a few signs in the village no trouble there but before that was a bit hard in finding it.
reviews.title: great little place
